name: sui-switchboard-examples
description: Sui examples for Switchboard On-Demand functionality with Quote Verifier

scripts.build:testnet: cp Move.testnet.toml Move.toml && sui move build
scripts.build:mainnet: cp Move.toml.bak Move.toml && sui move build || cp Move.toml.bak Move.toml
scripts.deploy:testnet: cp Move.testnet.toml Move.toml && sui client publish --gas-budget 100000000

author: Switchboard
